name: Root Fighter: Önd Edition
description:
Press F5 for button configuration

-- Special moves ---------------------------------------------------------

charge back, forward + punch: fireball

charge back, forward + two punches: EX fireball (costs energy)

charge down, up + punch: uppercut
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Touch the light at the center of the stage to regain health and build energy.

air LK can be cancelled into other air normals.

Ground normals can be cancelled in this order:
LK -> LP -> HK -> HP

Though they may not combo even if they cancel.

Music by Egg Toast (taken from Free Music Archive)
